HeroSection.title: Protect your business with private, secure cloud storage
description: Internxt secures your business from data loss with secure cloud storage built with ultra-powerful encryption.
We provide everything you need to manage your business securely.

SecureYourCompany.footerText: *Data collected from IBM Security Cost of a Data Breach Report 2023.

InternxtProtectsYourBusiness.title: Internxt protects your business from data breaches
description: Other providers hold the decryption keys to your data and can theoretically view your files, exposing your business to data breaches, hacks, or leaks.
We offer true data privacy  — we don't have access to your business information, your data is fully encrypted and accessible only to you.

WhatCanWeDo.title: What can you do with Internxt?
WhatCanWeDo.description: Optimize your organization's file management, security, and privacy with our secure cloud storage for business.

cards.description: Internxt empowers businesses with features to manage members of your organization, customize workspaces, and manage your account billing and payments.  Easily switch between your Internxt business and personal accounts to optimize productivity and file organization.

Secure cloud storage includes secure file-sharing features within different departments to collaborate safely in teams. Password-protect and restrict file access to send confidential files with partners, ensuring you maintain control over their security.

Internxt cloud storage offers advanced session management, providing real-time login notifications and detailed remote session monitoring (client, OS, IP, location, last active time). This high-level security allows the account manager to detect unauthorized access, manage sessions efficiently, and protect sensitive data.

Internxt gives your team full flexible storage allocation to upgrade your storage based on your needs. With our plans, you can add users, allocate storage based on needs, and increase capacity as necessary, ensuring cost efficiency, scalability, and optimal resource utilization.

PriceTable.businessDescription2: Ensure business data security with Internxt's encrypted cloud storage plans.

banner.title: Join the most secure cloud storage for businesses
banner.description: Internxt business plans offer unmatched data security and privacy.

WhyChooseInternxt.title: Why choose Internxt?
WhyChooseInternxt.description: Our cloud storage solution is designed for everyone, offering a secure product suite that's easy to understand and use, even if you're not a tech expert. Internxt provides powerful yet intuitive encrypted cloud storage, perfect for everyday use across various industries.

cards.title: GDPR compliant
cards.description: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other European privacy laws enforce strict data protection. By following these laws, Internxt takes every measure to protect your business data.

cards.title: Zero access, maximum encryption
cards.description: End-to-end encryption secures your files by encrypting everything on your device. Nobody, not even Internxt, can view your files. In the unlikely event of a data breach, hackers cannot decrypt and steal your business data.

cards.title: You control your data
cards.description: Unlike Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive, Internxt has zero trackers and never shares data with third parties. Your business data remains private and protected with the maximum security measures available.

cards.title: 100% transparent and secure
cards.description: All our products are built using open source. The code we use to protect data is available for everyone to inspect. We have nothing to hide except your data.

EncryptedCloudSolution.title: Encrypted cloud solutions for your business
EncryptedCloudSolution.description: Internxt provides advanced cloud storage security with military-grade encryption for file-sharing and storage to securely manage your organization.

TestimonialsSection.title: What experts are saying about us

testimonials.review: Internxt is an excellent cloud storage service due to its affordable plans and intuitive interface. It excels in security measures and commitment to privacy, making it a top choice for business users prioritizing security.
Internxt’s intuitively blended web access, file sync, and true backup services are impressive. This online storage and backup service is easy, covers all bases, and the lifetime plans are a steal.
Internxt is known as a secure cloud storage solution that prioritizes user privacy. If privacy and security are your highest concerns with cloud storage, it’s definitely worth considering Internxt.
Internxt goes above and beyond in protecting you and gives you ownership of your data, so they’re excellent for businesses. Recommended for anyone who values privacy.
Why choose Internxt? I would say the streamlined and simple nature of how it works. It's simply just a no-nonsense 256-bit encrypted cloud storage option that anyone can use.
Internxt Drive is the best secure cloud storage service for privacy and encryption. It enables you and your team to store different types of files with total security.

faq.question: What is Internxt for business?
answer: Our cloud storage for businesses provides companies of all sizes with a secure cloud storage solution that protects business files against data breaches. Business plans include access to Internxt Drive, VPN, and Send, as well as our upcoming new products, Internxt Mail and Meet.

faq.question: Is Internxt the right cloud storage for my business?
answer: Internxt is built for everyone, including businesses of any size looking for a secure cloud storage solution that keeps personal and confidential information private.
Our encrypted suite of products includes the highest industry security standards for companies who need to share files or folders without worrying about data leaks.

faq.question: Is Internxt more secure than other cloud storage services?
answer: Unlike Big Tech companies, Internxt is trusted to provide secure file storage for business because your business data is encrypted on your device for maximum security.
To prevent the threat of data breaches, Internxt provides additional security measures, including encrypted file sharing, Two-Factor authentication, Password Generator, and more.

faq.question: What if I reach my plan’s storage limit?
answer: Our plans are fully flexible to meet your business needs. You can easily add more users or upgrade your storage capacity as required, ensuring scalability and cost-efficiency.

faq.question: What level of technical support do you provide?
answer: We have a dedicated customer support team that can answer any questions or concerns or provide additional information based on your needs. You can visit our help center or contact us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com), and our team will be happy to assist you.
